title: Wholesale Price of Coal (From Mine) Rhine-Westphalia for Essen, Germany
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables -- (1)-- Original Data, 1879-1919, (2)--Original Data, 1913-1936. Coal Tax Imposed 08/1917. Tax Abolished 10/1923. Source: 1913-1923: Wirtschift Und Stat. 1925 "Lahlen Zur Geldentwertung" P. 26; Vierhljahrshefle Zur Statistik.

This NBER data series m04101b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 4 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter04.html.

NBER Indicator: m04101b
